title: Robb Report's Malcolmson on Rare Minute Repeater Watches(Audio)
itunes:title: Robb Report's Malcolmson on Rare Minute Repeater Watches(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: LUXURY: Robb Report’s Watch Editor, James Malcolmson, on rare minute repeater watches, and why these are opportune collectible and investment pieces.
